abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the main
            elements of SEGBA's investments in transmission lines,
            substations and distribution facilities in the Greater
            Buenos Aires region for the years 1977-1981, and the
            preparation of a national power expansion plan and a
            national power sector organization study, both to be carried
            out by the Government.
